channel.title: Yell command help

item.title: Yell command help
item.dc:creator: @Emchie Emchie
item.description:
@Emchie wrote:

If it is DeltaScape Server, just copy the ::message command. And Change It to ::yell, it should work. It did for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You probably have a Deltascape server. Try this.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
    String text = command.substring(5);
    yell(playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1).toLowerCase());
}

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command help
item.dc:creator: @kidzcoder kidzcoder
item.description:
@kidzcoder wrote:

        if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5); {
            String text = command.substring(5);
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": "
                    + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
                    + text.substring(1) + "";
        }

it don’t show any errors it just don’t work?
any suggestions?
